entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 17 February 2023
